Articles.Content:
Finally something space worthy from the group that made only atmospheric stuff!

With a new discovery called "outer space" we made no delay to get out there and conquer it (because there might be Kethane!) Nevertheless, we spent big bucks paying five-year-olds to design these craft. However, our engineers are on strike because of pay reasons, so we also hired those same five-year-olds to build our rockets too. To our amazement, these "sticks of boom" actually worked and now we all agree that space is awesome.

Without further ado, I present to you, you sexy beasts, the Triumvirate Rocket Family!

STANDARD PROBE LAUNCHER WITH STANDARD PROBE

NOTE: The three following craft have MechJeb in the pictures, but not in the .craft

Here is the the standard probe launcher, with a little over enough fuel to get into a 75km x 75km orbit. With it, comes our standard probe, Probey (the same kids also named the probe, just to keep them happy)!

http://www./?7stth5dmumkektv

As you can see, the Probe Launcher is just a some fuel slapped onto a big cylinder of somewhat-controlled explosives.

1.25m STANDARD CAPSULE WITH LES & LAUNCH KIT

With the introduction of an actual record of Kerbals that will be killed, we decided to add a launch escape system, despite Jebediah's pleas not to. What could we do? Face a possible lawsuit now because of proper record keeping? We think not!

This presentation is special because instead of just one .craft, you three for just the price of three payments of one! Contained within this special deal is a test system of our LES, the capsule, and the capsule itself! Each of which contain our Touch-And-Be-EliminatedÃ¢â€žÂ¢ LES! (Can you tell that we're proud of our launch escape system?)

Capsule .craft http://www./?49dymvd657j6ufg

LES Test Craft .craft http://www./?z7oi5dacovcp06l

Launch Kit .craft http://www./?yoardn9k383mak5

2.25m STANDARD CAPSULE WITH LES & LAUNCH KIT

Once our engineers found out they're not getting any slack from us, and that we hold powerful connections in the government, they decided that the best idea was to just come back and work. One of them suggested that we launch three Kerbals at once and we immediately named him Designer-in-Chief. With this new design, it comes with this ability to mate with other ships for whatever reasons our consumers need that for. Anyway, it gets it up to a nice 75x75 orbit with fuel to spare, however, our Designer-in-Chief was also a hardcore Kessler fan so he designed the orbital stage without the ability to deorbit. He argued that debris was cool. Also, this pack comes with the launch kit and the capsule itself for two easy payments of one launch craft! Despite Jebediah's protests, we added a LES on this one too.

Capsule .craft http://www./?4ekrmrzw2p2rd95

Launch Kit .craft http://www./?k4659cxzd0u8xze

If you launch it with MechJeb, then you'll be carrying the SRBs for a little longer until the fuel burns out or if you launch it full throttle (Jebediah ApprovedÃ¢â€žÂ¢) then you decouple them about the same time.

Edited August 9, 2013 by NASI Director
Grammatical Error
Triumvirate... I like the naming scheme you have going on there. Seems someone loves Roman history

Triumvirate... I like the naming scheme you have going on there. Seems someone loves Roman history

Quite. I'm building a space station named Praetorian Prefect. But don't tell anyone! Top secret!!!
